Trade/Device Name(s): On Call Chosen Blood Glucose Monitoring System
On Call Chosen Blood Glucose Meter
On Call Chosen Blood Glucose Test Strips
On Call Chosen Glucose Control Solution
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): On Call Chosen Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for the On Call Chosen Blood Glucose Monitoring System utilizing an electrochemical enzymatic assay for quantitative detection of glucose in capillary whole blood.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative detection of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from the fingertip, palm, and forearm by individuals with diabetes at home to aid in monitoring diabetes control; not for diagnosis or neonatal use.
